title: Melissa Lucarelli keen to return to Married At First Sight
text:
She was part of one of the most mismatched couples in Married At First Sight history.

So it's no surprise that Melissa Lucarelli is keen to return to the reality series for another chance following news that producers have brought back jilted bride Elizabeth Sobinoff for the upcoming seventh season.

Responding to fans on Instagram, the 39-year-old said: 'They really should!! They gave Lizzie another shot, so you never know.'

'You never know!' Former Married At First Sight star Melissa Lucarelli is keen to return to the show for another chance at love

She added: 'Or maybe they just can’t find anyone for me.'

Melissa became a MAFS fan favourite after her appearance on the show's sixth season earlier this year.

And while it's been more than six months since the show has been on TV, the vivacious talent agent still receives gushing comments from fans asking her to return to the series.

'She was my fave!' Melissa became a MAFS fan favourite after her appearance on the show's sixth season earlier this year (pictured)

'You were the most stunning bride! Loved your dress!' exclaimed one fan on a recent post.

'She was my fave besides Cyclone Cyrell,' gushed another.

The outgoing brunette was bizarrely matched with stripper-turned-meditation guru Dino Hira on MAFS.

Disaster: The outgoing brunette was bizarrely matched with stripper-turned-meditation guru Dino Hira on MAFS, making them one of the most mismatched couples in the show's history

The mismatched couple struggled to find a physical or emotional connection on the series and broke up halfway through filming.

Melissa has failed to find love since the show wrapped and has been open about not having sex for over eight years.

Unfortunately, while Melissa hasn't been asked back for the new season yet, Elizabeth Sobinoff has been brought back as an intruder bride.

She's back! While Melissa hasn't been asked back for the new season yet, Elizabeth Sobinoff (pictured) has been brought back as an intruder bride

Her new husband has already been pictured on set moments before tying the knot with the former Married At First Sight star.

Dressed in a sharp navy suit, the mystery man failed to evade the paparazzi during their nuptials at Curzon Hall in Sydney earlier this month.

Elizabeth was paired with Sam Ball on season six of MAFS, but he cheated on her with Ines Basic.
description: She was part of one of the most mismatched couples in Married At First Sight history.
